name: Collect to Grow
description:
Collect to Grow by Joey Yee

My game does not have a specific ending. I wanted to focus on the sound and happiness the game would bring to the player! I hope you enjoy it! 

FYI: The growth is really small so just enjoy the game!

Controls:

Arrows: to move character

Space: jump
